name: Goosebumps (itch) (Rapptr Std.)
description:
Are you afraid of ghosts? In this game you are one!

Watch out for bats, don't float too low or too high or you could lose!

Goosebumps is a simple but fun game in which your mission will be to escape from the haunted castle, avoiding touching the floor and the ceiling, as well as vetitating to collide with the bats that come flying towards you.

Accumulate the largest amount of coins in your attempt to escape and be careful as each time the speed and difficulty have increased!
